title: go.talks/present: support go run -race
body:
I'm preparing a talk about concurrency.  I'd like to demo the race detector.  I can do
this by flipping over to a shell, but it would be great to be able to demo the race
detector by pressing "Run" on the slide.  Note that to make the line numbers
in the output useful, this would also need to address issue #5248.
